sentences.en: For his dedication the Mayor awarded him a medal of merit.
sentences.cn: 为表彰他的奉献精神，市长授予他荣誉奖章。

sentences.en: Health workers are a breed apart in their commitment and dedication to duty.
sentences.cn: 在所承担的义务和献身精神方面,保健人员是很不相同的.

sentences.en: Her dedication to her work was admirable.
sentences.cn: 她对工作的奉献精神可钦可佩。

sentences.en: Her dedication to her work was admirable.
sentences.cn: 她对工作的奉献精神可钦可佩。

sentences.en: I admire her dedication to the job.
sentences.cn: 我佩服她对工作专心致志.

sentences.en: I have come to this country to reaffirm that dedication.
sentences.cn: 我这次到贵国来,就是为了重申这种献身的决心.

sentences.en: Material elements needed the impetus of intangibles of faith and dedication.
sentences.cn: 物质因素还必须由无形的信念和献身精神来推动.

sentences.en: Some 250 guests attended the dedication ceremony.
sentences.cn: 约有250位来宾参加了奉献典礼。

sentences.en: The archbishop attended the dedication of the new church.
sentences.cn: 主教出席了奉献新教堂的典礼.

sentences.en: The new model is a testament to the skill and dedication of the workforce.
sentences.cn: 这种新型产品显示了全体员工的技术水平和敬业精神。

sentences.en: To be successful takes hard work and dedication.
sentences.cn: 成功需要付出艰苦的努力，需要有全身心投入的精神。

sentences.en: To reach a high level of skill requires talent, dedication, and a lot of hard work.
sentences.cn: 要达到高级水平需要天分，还需要全身心的投入和很多的努力。

sentences.en: We admire her courage, compassion and dedication.
sentences.cn: 我们钦佩她的勇气、爱心和奉献精神。

sentences.en: We admire her dedication to the cause of humanity.
sentences.cn: 我们敬佩她对人类事业的献身精神。

sentences.en: We all admire professionalism and dedication.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都对专业素质和奉献精神表示钦佩。

words.tran_cn: 以…奉献；把…用于（dedicate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: hard work or effort that someone puts into a particular activity because they care about it a lot
